mapper.select: select usr_id, usr_name, usr_password, usr_role_id, usr_flag, role.role_name as usr_role_name from sys_user as user left join sys_role as role on role.role_id = user.usr_role_id where usr_name=#{usr_name} and usr_password=#{usr_password}
select usr_id, usr_name, usr_password, usr_role_id, usr_flag from sys_user where usr_id = #{usr_id}
